023package org.opt4j.core.config.visualization;
024
025import java.io.File;
026import java.util.Collection;
027import java.util.Set;
028import java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArraySet;
029
030import javax.swing.JFileChooser;
031
032import org.opt4j.core.config.ModuleLoader;
033import org.opt4j.core.config.ModuleRegister;
034import org.opt4j.core.config.ModuleSaver;
035import org.opt4j.core.config.PropertyModule;
036
037import com.google.inject.Inject;
038import com.google.inject.Module;
039import com.google.inject.Singleton;
040
041/**
042 * The {@link FileOperations}.
043 * 
044 * @author lukasiewycz
045 * 
046 */
047@Singleton
048public class FileOperations {
049
050        protected File file = null;
051
052        protected final FileChooser fileChooser;
053
054        protected final ModuleRegister moduleRegister;
055
056        protected final SelectedModules selectedModules;
057
058        protected final Set<FileOperationsListener> listeners = new CopyOnWriteArraySet<>();
059
060        /**
061         * The {@link FileOperationsListener}.
062         * 
063         * @author lukasiewycz
064         * 
065         */
066        public interface FileOperationsListener {
067
068                /**
069                 * Invoked if the current file is changed (on load or save).
070                 * 
071                 * @param file
072                 *            the current file
073                 */
074                public void setCurrentFile(File file);
075        }
076
077        /**
078         * Constructs a {@link FileOperations}.
079         * 
080         * @param moduleRegister
081         *            all available modules
082         * @param selectedModules
083         *            all selected modules
084         * @param fileChooser
085         *            the FileChooser
086         */
087        @Inject
088        public FileOperations(ModuleRegister moduleRegister, SelectedModules selectedModules, FileChooser fileChooser) {
089                super();
090                this.moduleRegister = moduleRegister;
091                this.selectedModules = selectedModules;
092                this.fileChooser = fileChooser;
093        }
094
095        /**
096         * Sets the current file
097         * 
098         * @see #getFile
099         * @param file
100         *            the current file
101         */
102        protected void setFile(File file) {
103                this.file = file;
104                for (FileOperationsListener listener : listeners) {
105                        listener.setCurrentFile(file);
106                }
107        }
108
109        /**
110         * Returns the current file.
111         * 
112         * @see #setFile
113         * @return the current file
114         */
115        public File getFile() {
116                return file;
117        }
118
119        /**
120         * Opens the file chooser for loading the current configuration file.
121         */
122        public void load() {
123                JFileChooser fc = fileChooser.get();
124                fc.setFileFilter(null);
125                fc.setVisible(true);
126                fc.setCurrentDirectory(getFile());
127
128                int returnVal = fc.showDialog(null, "Load");
129
130                if (returnVal == JFileChooser.APPROVE_OPTION) {
131                        load(fc.getSelectedFile());
132                }
133        }
134
135        /**
136         * Opens the file chooser for saving the current configuration file.
137         */
138        public void saveAs() {
139                JFileChooser fc = fileChooser.get();
140                fc.setFileFilter(null);
141                fc.setVisible(true);
142                fc.setCurrentDirectory(getFile());
143
144                int returnVal = fc.showDialog(null, "Save");
145
146                if (returnVal == JFileChooser.APPROVE_OPTION) {
147                        save(fc.getSelectedFile());
148                }
149        }
150
151        /**
152         * Loads the selected modules from the specified file.
153         * 
154         * @param file
155         *            the configuration file
156         */
157        public void load(File file) {
158                setFile(file);
159
160                selectedModules.clear();
161
162                ModuleLoader loader = new ModuleLoader(moduleRegister);
163
164                Collection<? extends Module> modules = loader.load(file);
165                for (Module module : modules) {
166                        PropertyModule m = new PropertyModule(module);
167                        selectedModules.add(m);
168                }
169                System.out.println("Loaded configuration from " + file);
170        }
171
172        /**
173         * Saves the current selected modules to the current file.
174         */
175        public void save() {
176                save(file);
177        }
178
179        /**
180         * Saves the current selected modules to the specified file.
181         * 
182         * @param file
183         *            the configuration file
184         */
185        public void save(File file) {
186                setFile(file);
187                ModuleSaver saver = new ModuleSaver();
188
189                Collection<PropertyModule> modules = selectedModules;
190
191                System.out.println(modules);
192
193                saver.save(file, modules);
194                System.out.println("Saved configuration to " + file);
195        }
196
197        /**
198         * Adds a listener.
199         * 
200         * @see #removeListener
201         * @param listener
202         *            the listener to add
203         */
204        public synchronized void addListener(FileOperationsListener listener) {
205                listeners.add(listener);
206        }
207
208        /**
209         * Removes a listener.
210         * 
211         * @see #addListener
212         * @param listener
213         *            the listener to remove
214         */
215        public synchronized void removeListener(FileOperationsListener listener) {
216                listeners.remove(listener);
217        }
218
219}
